info.title: Profile
info.description: Digital Commerce APIs covering Profile, Address, Account, credit-profiles and finance resources used typically in checkout flows

get.summary: Get default profile associated with current token.
get.description: Get default profile associated with current token.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Format "Authorization Bearer <<OAuth Token>>"

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Request message format (default is application/json)

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Content-Types that are acceptable. Currently only application/json is supported

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: API version.

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description: Channel identifier. NA is treated as default.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: Consuming Application identifier. NA is treated as default. More values will be added to swagger as clients are onboarded.

parameters.name: interactionId
parameters.description: Alphanumeric value represent a common transaction id across all calls made from UI, while completing all business activity needs of a particular customer.

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the retail store location. Mandatory for FullService  (Tmobile RETAIL channel). Need to discuss with T-Mobile business liaison if there is a need for Partner to pass their retail Store Id).

get.summary: Get profile by profile id which is the system generated resource identifier

post.summary: Add account information to the current profile.
post.description: Add account information associated with the profile. This information is used to pass downstream for fulfillment and provisioning.

parameters.description: Format "Authorization Bearer <<OAuth Token>>"

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Request message format as application/json or application/xml (default assumed application/json)

parameters.name: follow
parameters.description: If true, does not return the resource detail after performing the action. Default false

parameters.name: profileId
parameters.description: Profile id for which account needs to be created

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Account details for the account which needs to be created

get.summary: Get all accounts associated with the current token/profile.
get.description: Get all accounts for the profile. Token in the header is used to identify the associated profile. Account resource is created only for activation flow. For logged in user, binding will be done from customer data store.

delete.summary: Delete account information associated with the account resource id.
delete.description: Delete account info by account id from the commerce system. This operation is used when the temporary account info in billing system is removed/purged.

post.summary: The credit profile captures the credit check information which is the outcome of the credit check. Credit Info can be updated independent of the profile itself.
post.description: The credit profile captures the credit check information which is the outcome of the credit check. Credit Info can be updated independent of the profile itself.

200.description: Updated Finance data for Account successfully.

profileId.description: System generated encoded resource id returned in GET operations only. Not applicable for any UPDATE

accountId.description: encoded account id generated by DCP which is used for update/delete operations

address2.description: extended address or Address Line 2. ex. Apt/Unit etc.

externalAddressId.description: externalAddressId. Some backend processing systems need this.

geoTaxKeyO.description: Tax Code corresponding to the geoLoca used by Vertex-O. Some backend processing systems need this.

geoTaxKeyQ.description: Tax Code corresponding to the geoLoca used by Vertex-Q. Some backend processing systems need this.

latitude.description: latitude. Some backend systems may need this

longitude.description: longitude. Some backend systems may need this

overrideIndicator.description: Flag indicating if the suggested address was overridden by User

resultNumber.description: resultNumber from Address Validation system. Some backend systems need this.

externalAddressId.description: External address ID is used to fetch the address from other integrated system which can return the full address by using this external address id. If external address id is passed then all other fields are optional for add address.

addressId.description: Encoded address ID specific to DCP which is basically used in case of UPDATE/DELETE address operations.

accountTenure.description: Duration of the account for the customer.

behaviorScore.description: It is outcome of credit decision and will be used by some backend system during fulfillment.

creditAppRefId.description: It is credit application number in credit system and will be used by some backend system during fulfillment.

creditClass.description: Credit class as a Credit risk profile id.

decisionCriteria.description: It is outcome of credit decision system and will be used by some backend system during fulfillment.

creditProfileId.description: Encoded credit Profile id specific to DCP which is used in case of update credit Profile API.

documentId.description: It is document id from Docusign.

eipPlanId.description: This is EIP plan id from Loan and Lease system.

status.description: Indicates the status of the EIP agreements.
